author: timbeiko
content: re: the last few messages in <#745077610685661265>, I would re-emphasize Martin's comment on ACD that, right now, EIPs tend to dump a lot of work on client implementers to figure out implementations. I'd say we are much more constrained by client implementers' bandwidth vs. EIPs coming in, so I would still push towards something that makes life easier for them (as well as EIP eidtors).

author: timbeiko
content: So, yes, a python implementation might be extra work, but I do think that if it's work that then makes client teams' lives easier, it's worth it

author: timbeiko
content: also, just like the current system, EIP Champions could partner with the spec team to get a PR done if they feel they can't do it but that their proposal is important enough
